p: To confirm that negative samples were truly negative and not simply below the level of detection by the qRT-PCR assay, negative samples were inoculated onto confluent Vero cells in 6-well tissue culture plates. Culture media was collected at days 1 and 5 post inoculation, extracted and again assayed by qRT-PCR to look for growth in titer indicative of replication (and thus infectiousness).
